Aberrant Mark of Contagion Heroic Dragonmark Ongoing Damage Physical Change Power Enhancement Saving Throw Penalty Whenever you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against ongoing damage until the end of the encounter. You are immune to the negative effects of diseases from sources that are more than 5 levels lower than you, though you still carry and spread those diseases.
Aberrant Mark of Madness Heroic Dragonmark Defense Penalty Physical Change Power Enhancement Whenever you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to Will until the end of the encounter. You are immune to the negative effects of madness from sources 5 levels lower than yourself.
Aberrant Mark of Terror Heroic Dragonmark Attack Penalty Fear Physical Change Power Enhancement Whenever you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, that enemy takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of the encounter. This is a Fear effect. You are immune to the negative effects of Fear and intimidation from sources 5 levels lower than yourself.
Academy Prodigy Heroic Eladrin Artificer Class Racial Skill Enhancement You gain a +3 feat bonus to two skills from the artificer's class skill list. This counts as the Skill Focus feat for these skills.
Accidental Tells Heroic Bloodline Tiefling Mantle of Misfortune Luck Misfortune Bloodline Racial Skill Enhancement When you make an Insight check against a creature within the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you can roll twice and take the better result.
Accurate Magic Armaments Heroic Artificer Attack Bonus Class Equipment Support Whenever you use an Artificer power that targets a weapon or an implement, the next attack roll with that weapon or implement before the end of the encounter gains a +1 bonus.
Accursed Challenge Heroic Paladin Avandra Class Mark Punishment Saving Throw Penalty Worship Whenever a creature marked by you makes an attack that does no include you as a target, the target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the start of its next turn.
Accursed Coordination Heroic Warlock Warlock's Curse Class Combat Advantage Teamwork You can place your curse on a creature that is already under another warlock's curse, and other warlocks can place their curse on a creature that is already under your curse. In addition, you have combat advantage against any creature under more than one warlock's curse.
Acid Wash Heroic Genasi acid surge Acid Condition Negation Mobility Power Enhancement Racial When you use acid surge, you ignore the immobilized, restrained, and slowed conditions during the move.
Acolyte of Divine Secrets Heroic Multiclass Wisdom13 Multiclass Invoker Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training
Also, choose a 1st-level Invoker at-will attack power. You can use that power as an encounter power. In addition, you gain proficiency in Invoker implements.
Acolyte of the Veil Heroic Multiclass Dexterity13 Multiclass Assassin Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training Stealth
Also, you gain the shadow step assassin class power as an encounter power. In addition, you gain proficiency in ki focuses.
Acrobatic Climber Heroic Acrobatics Mobility Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks. Also, you can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for checks to climb.
Action Rush Heroic Human Ranger Rogue Action Point Class Mobility Racial When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can shift 2 squares as a free action either before or after taking the extra action.
Action Surge Heroic Human Action Point Attack Bonus Racial You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls you make during any extra action you gain by spending an action point.
Active Familiar Heroic Familiar Arcane Familiar Familiar Mobility When you take a move action, you can also move your familiar its speed or shift it 1 square.
Adaptable Breath Heroic Dragonborn dragon breath Power Enhancement Racial Choose a type of damage your dragon breath doesn't already deal from among acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to use the chosen damage type and corresponding damage keyword rather than the normal damage dealt by the power. Only one damage type and keyword applies to a given attack. You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another damage type for your dragon breath that you don't already have for it.
Adaptable Nature Heroic Goliath Racial Skill Enhancement Whenever any creature you can see succeeds on a skill check, you gain a +2 feat bonus to that skill until the end of your next turn.
Adept Dilettante Heroic Multiclass Half-elf Multiclass Power Enhancement Racial You can use your Constitution, Wisdom, or Charisma to determine bonuses to attack rolls and damage with the power you chose for your Dilettante racial trait instead of the ability that power normally uses. This feat counts as a class-specific multiclass feat for the class from which your Dilettante power comes.
Advantage of Cunning Heroic Bard Virtue of Cunning Class Forced Movement When you slide an ally with your Virtue of Cunning feature, you can also slide an enemy that was adjacent to that ally into the space the ally vacated.
Advantageous Eye Heroic Bloodline Vistani Heritage Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Support Vistani Heritage When you hit a target with your evil eye of the Vistani bloodline power, the target grants combat advantage to all your allies for the duration of the power.
Advantageous Rebuke Heroic Invoker Covenant of Preservation Attack Bonus Channel Divinity Class Combat Advantage Support When you hit with an attack that is benefitting from a bonus to the attack roll from preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, the target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Aegis Accuracy Heroic Swordmage Swordmage Aegis Attack Bonus Class Mark Punishment If a target marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the marked creature until the end of your next turn.
Aegis Vitality Heroic Swordmage Swordmage Aegis Class Mark Punishment Temporary Hit Points If a target marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, you gain 5 temporary hit points. These temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and 15 at 21st level.
Aerenal Arcanist Heroic Elf any arcane Aerenal Arcane Background Power Repertoire Racial Choose an additional power for each level of utility power you know from an arcane class. Each time you learn a new level of utility powers for an arcane class, choose an additional one of the same level. After an extended rest, choose which arcane utility power of each level you can use for that day. This feat does not change the number of arcane utility powers you can use each day. If you use a Spellbook, the additional utility power is in addition to any you gain from that feature.
Aerenal Half-life Heroic Elf Aerenal Action Point Attack Bonus Background Necrotic Racial You gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with necrotic powers. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and +4 at 21st level. In addition, you also gain the bonus to attack rolls with necrotic powers you make during any extra action you gain by spending an action point.
Against All Odds Heroic Wisdom13 Attack Bonus Damage Bonus If, at the start of your turn, three or more enemies are adjacent to you, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of your turn. The bonus to damage rolls increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.
Aggressive Advantage Heroic Combat Advantage Initiative You gain combat advantage against all enemies until the end of your first turn in each combat.
Aggressive Assault Heroic Rogue First Strike Brutal Scoundrel Class Forced Movement Initiative At the beginning of an encounter, whenever you hit a target that has not yet acted, you slide that target 1 square.
Aggressive Spirit Heroic Shaman Class Kill Effect Teleportation Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a spirit attack power, you can teleport your spirit companion 10 squares to a square adjacent on an enemy as a free reaction.
Agile Form Heroic Druid wild shape Class Mobility Shapechange When you use your wild shape to change from your humanoid form to a beast form, you can shift 1 square. Starting at 21st level, you can shift 2 squares.
Agile Guardian Heroic Dexterity13 Warden Class Mobility Power Enhancement Shapechange You can shift 1 square when you assume a Guardian Form. Starting at 21st level, you can shift 2 squares.
Agile Hunter Heroic Dexterity15 Ranger Hunter's Quarry Attack Penalty Class Critical Mobility When you score a critical hit with a melee attack against your quarry, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. In addition, the enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.
Agile Running Attack Heroic Ranger Running Attack Class Mobility When you move as part of using a Ranger attack power, you ignore difficult terrain.
Agile Stand Heroic Avenger Monk Ranger Rogue Class Mobility Once per turn when you stand up from prone, you can also shift 1 square. This increases to up to 2 squares at 21st level.
Agile Superiority Heroic Fighter Combat Superiority Attack Bonus Class Reactive Strikes The attack bonus for your Combat Superiority uses your Dexterity modifier instead of your Wisdom modifier.
Airspur Windrider Heroic Akanûl Background Mobility You subtract 10 feet from the distance you fall before determining falling damage. This increases to 20 feet subtracted at 21st level.
Alchemical Affinity Heroic Warforged Equipment Racial Temporary Hit Points Once per attack when you hit an enemy using a consumable alchemical item attack power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.
Alchemical Blood Heroic Warforged Damage Bonus Equipment Racial Temporary Hit Points Choose one damage type from the following: acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, or thunder. When you use an attack power or an alchemical item attack power with the chosen keyword, you gain a +2 feat bonus to the damage roll. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. Additionally, while you have any temporary hit points, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with all alchemical item attack powers. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.
Alchemical Opportunist Heroic Equipment Reactive Strikes If you have an alchemical item in hand when an enemy provokes an reactive strike from you, you can use that alchemical item instead of making a melee basic attack.
Alchemical Scrounger Heroic Equipment Miss Mitigation When you miss all targets with an alchemical item, roll a d20. On a result of 10 or higher, you can recover the item as a short rest activity. You can only recover one item per day. If you take this feat as a paragon tier feat, you can recover two alchemical items each day. If you take it as an epic tier feat, you can recover three.
Alchemist Heroic Equipment You can make alchemical items of your level or lower. You must have the correct formula and training in an appropriate skill. You learn two formulas of your level or lower when you first take this feat.
Alertness Heroic Initiative Perception You cannot be surprised. Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Perception checks.
Alhahn's Mindful Relocation Heroic Githzerai Shifting Fortunes Mobility Racial When you use your Shifting Fortunes, you can shift your speed instead of 3 squares.
Allegiance to the Daughter Heroic Warlock Infernal Pact Class Fire Kill Effect Whenever you reduce an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points or less with a warlock attack, the enemy's space fills with hellfire until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the flames takes fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level.
Ambush Tactics Heroic any martial Class Damage Bonus Initiative The first enemy you damage during the first round of an encounter takes 1d6 extra damage if it has not acted yet. This damage increases to 2d6 at 11th, and 3d6 at 21st level.
Ancestral Wrath Heroic Bloodline Dwarf Forgeborn Bloodied Charge Forgeborn Heritage Mobility Racial While you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to speed. This increases to a +2 bonus when you charge.
Ancient Covenant of Nessus Heroic Tiefling Invoker Divine Covenant Class Extra Attack Fire Racial When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, instead of your normal covenant manifestation, you can allow one target of the power to make a basic attack as a free reaction. If the target makes this attack, it takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier after resolving the attack. This fire damage increases to 10 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 15 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
Ancient Lore of the Dawn War Heroic Languages Skill Enhancement You have studied the lore of old deities and the history of the Dawn War: you gain a +2 feat bonus to History and Religion checks, and you gain the Supernal language.
Ancient Soul Heroic Dragonborn Sorcerer Dragon Magic dragon breath Class Power Enhancement Power Recovery Racial You can consider your dragon breath racial power an arcane attack power, adding the Arcane keyword to it. In addition, if your dragon breath deals damage of the same type as your Dragon Magic feature gives you resistance to, you gain the following benefit: Whenever you take damage of the type dealt by your dragon breath (after the damage dealt is reduced by your resistance), you regain the use of your dragon breath if you have already expended it.
Ancient Wisdom Heroic Wilden Shaman voyage of the ancients Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Racial Support When you use your voyage of the ancients power, the enemy you choose also grants combat advantage to each ally adjacent to your spirit companion until the end of your next turn.
Angelic Harrier Heroic Invoker Class Forced Movement Power Enhancement When you hit only one target with an Invoker ranged encounter or daily attack, you can slide the target 1 square after the power has been resolved.
Anger Unleashed Heroic Half-orc Attack Bonus Bloodied Racial The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Animal Empathy Heroic Nature Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks. Also, when you would make an Insight check against a natural beast, you can make a Nature check instead.
Ankle Biter Heroic Goblin Critical Damage Bonus Racial Size-based You gain a +1 bonus to melee damage rolls against creatures larger than you. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and +3 at 21st level. Also, when you score a critical hit against a creature larger than you, the creature takes 1d6 extra damage. This extra damage increases to 2d6 at 21st level.
Ankle Cutter Heroic Small or smaller Rogue Sneak Attack Class Movement Hindrance Racial Size-based When you hit a target that is at least two sizes larger than you (Large, if you are small) and would deal Sneak Attack damage against that target, you can forgo rolling two of your Sneak Attack dice. If you do so, you cause the target to be slowed until the end of your next turn. Using this option count as using Sneak Attack for the turn, even if you end up not rolling any Sneak Attack damage.
Ape's Reach Heroic Druid wild shape Basic Attack Bloodied Class Reach Shapechange Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Athletics checks. Additionally, when you are in beast form and you are bloodied, you gain +1 reach with melee basic attacks.
Aquatic Blood Heroic Elf Half-elf Background Mobility Racial You gain a swim speed of 5. In addition, you gain the Aquatic keyword. In aquatic combat, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against non-aquatic creatures.
Arcane Dockhand Heroic Background Mobility Rituals Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 bonus to Acrobatics checks made to balance, and to Athletics checks made to climb. Also, you master the ritual make whole and can perform it without a ritual book.
Arcane Familiar Heroic Familiar any arcane Class Familiar You gain a familiar. For each Familiar feat you have beyond this one, your familiar gains a +1 bonus to all defenses.
Arcane Fire Heroic Intelligence13 any arcane Class Cold Fire When you hit a target with an arcane Fire power, that target gains vulnerable 5 cold against the first arcane attack power you use against it before the end of your next turn. This vulnerability increases to vulnerable 10 cold at 21st level.
Arcane Fury Heroic Half-orc any arcane furious assault Class Damage Bonus Racial When you use your furious assault racial power to deal extra damage to the target of an area or close arcane power, you deal the extra damage to all targets you hit with the power, not just one.
Arcane Implement Proficiency Heroic any arcane Class Proficiency Gain Choose a type of implement that any arcane class is proficient in. You gain proficiency in that kind of implement. If the implement is also a weapon, you do not gain proficiency in using it as a weapon.
Arcane Initiate Heroic Multiclass Intelligence13 Multiclass Wizard Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training
Choose a 1st-level wizard at-will attack power. You can use that power as an encounter power. In addition, you gain proficiency in Wizard implements.
Arcane Malice Heroic Spellscar any arcane Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Spellscar Whenever you make an arcane daily attack, choose one creature you hit with that attack. You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the chosen creature until the end of the encounter. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, you also gain +1 attack bonus against that creature until the end of the encounter.
Arcane Porter Heroic Familiar Arcane Familiar Equipment Familiar Your familiar can pick up and carry an unattended object weighing 5 pounds or less. It can hold only one object at a time.
Arcane Prodigy Heroic Multiclass Charisma13 Damage Bonus Multiclass Sorcerer Skill Training
Also, once per encounter as a free action, you gain a +2 bonus to your next damage roll. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and +4 at 21st level. In addition, you gain proficiency in Sorcerer implements.
Arcane Repositioning Heroic Eladrin any arcane fey step Class Racial Summoning Teleportation On your turn, you can use your fey step as a free action with the following target and effect: Closeburst 5one conjuration of 1 square or smaller, or one Medium or smaller creature summoned by you You teleport the target up to 5 squares.
Arcane Reserves Heroic Human any arcane Class Damage Bonus Racial When all your arcane encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your arcane at-will attack powers until you regain the use of one or more of your arcane encounter attack powers. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.
Arcane Spellfury Heroic Sorcerer Attack Bonus Class When you hit an enemy with a sorcerer at-will attack power, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the end of your next turn.
Arcane Trapsmith Heroic Artificer Thievery Class Skill Enhancement Traps You can use your Intelligence modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier when making Thievery checks to disable traps or open locks. Also, you gain a +4 feat bonus to Arcana checks related to traps or hazards.
Arcane Vampire Heroic Vampire any arcane Class Combination Damage Bonus Healing Surge Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with an arcane encounter attack, you gain a healing surge. Also, before rolling damage for an arcane encounter attack power, you can lose a healing surge to gain a bonus to the triggering power's damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier. This bonus damage increases to 3 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and 6 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.
Ardent Tsucora Initiation Heroic Kalashtar Ardent ardent outrage Class Movement Hindrance Power Enhancement Racial When you use ardent outrage, each target treats squares adjacent to you as difficult terrain until the end of its next turn.
Arena-Fighter's Recovery Heroic Fighter Arena Training Class Damage Bonus Second Wind Weapon Specialization When you use your second wind, you gain a bonus to damage rolls with your arena weapons until the end of your next turn. The bonus is equal to your Dexterity modifier. The damage bonus increases to 2 + your Dexterity modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Dexterity modifier at 21st level.
Argent Falcon Heroic Familiar Arcane Familiar 6th-level or higher Sehanine Combat Advantage Familiar Illumination Support Worship You replace one utility power of 6th level or higher with the argent falcon feat power.
Argent Falcon Feat Utility 6 Your familiar briefly transforms into a silver falcon, and shines with pure moonlight Encounter Divine Minor Action
true Effect: Until the end of your next turn, your familiar sheds bright light in its space and each square within 3 squares of it. Enemies within the light grant combat advantage.
Armor Endurance Training Heroic Armor Skill Enhancement You ignore the check penalty to Strength- and Constitution-based skills for wearing armor with all armors you are proficient in.
Armor Expertise Heroic any martial Armor Class Skill Enhancement You ignore the check penalty to skills for wearing armor with all armors you are proficient in.
Armor Nimbleness Training Heroic Armor Skill Enhancement You ignore the check penalty to Dexterity-based skills for wearing armor with all armors you are proficient in.
Armor of Burning Wrath Heroic Invoker Covenant of Wrath Channel Divinity Class Fire Power Enhancement Your armor of wrath Channel Divnity power deals fire and radiant damage and gains the Fire keyword. The target also takes a -1 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
Armor of Winter Heroic Invoker Covenant of Wrath the Raven Queen Channel Divinity Class Cold Condition Infliction Power Enhancement Undead-hunting Worship Your armor of wrath Channel Divnity power gains additional benefits against undead: An undead target takes an additional 1d6 cold damage, and the power gains the Cold keyword when targeting undead. This additional damage increases to 2d6 at 21st level. An undead bloodied by the attack is also immobilized until the end of its next turn.
Armor Proficiency (Chainmail) Heroic Strength13 Constitution13 leather armor hide armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with chainmail armor.
Armor Proficiency (Hide) Heroic Strength13 Constitution13 leather armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with hide armor.
Armor Proficiency (Leather) Heroic Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with leather armor.
Armor Proficiency (Plate) Heroic Strength15 Constitution15 scale armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with plate armor.
Armor Proficiency (Scale) Heroic Strength13 Constitution13 chainmail armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with scale armor.
Armor Snag Heroic plate armor shield Armor Grapple Shield You've learned to use your armor and shield to injure any opponent foolish enough to grab you. When wearing plate armor you are proficient with or wielding a shield you are proficient with, a creature takes damage equal to 2 + one-half your level when you escape that creature's grab or when that creature escapes your grab. A creature can take damage from this only once per turn. A creature that swallows you or uses a similar ability takes this damage at the end of its turn as long as you remain swallowed or similarly held.
Armored Sorcerer Heroic Sorcerer Spell Source leather armor Armor Class Damage Resistance When you are wearing leather armor you are proficient in, any resistance you have gained through your Spell Source feature increases by 2. This benefit increases to 3 at 11th level, and to 5 at 21st level.
Armored Warlord Heroic Warlord Battlefront Leader Armor Class Healing Surge Proficiency Gain You gain one Armor Proficiency feat of your choice without having to meet the ability score prerequisites. In addition, your number of healing surges increases by 1.
Armored Warrenguard Heroic Gnome Armor Defense Mobility Proficiency Gain Racial Size-based You gain proficiency in chainmail armor and scale armor. If you already had proficiency with one or both, you instead ignore the penalty to speed for wearing chainmail or scale armor you are proficient in. In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to AC against attacks from Large or larger enemies.
Artificial Body Heroic Shardmind Warforged Living Construct Damage Resistance Racial You gain resist poison equal to 5 + one-half your level.
Assassin's Challenge Heroic Assassin Paladin assassin's shroud Class Combination Power Enhancement Mark Punishment Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency in holy symbol implements. In addition, whenever a creature takes damage from your divine sanction, that creature takes 1 extra damage for each of your shrouds on it. This extra damage increases to 2 per shroud at 11th level, and to 3 per shroud at 21st level.
Assassin's Cloak Heroic Assassin Class Stealth Whenever you become invisible, you can make Stealth check to hide as a free reaction.
Assassin's Escape Heroic Assassin shade form Class Damage Resistance Triggered You can use your shade form power as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger: You take damage
Astral Elixir Heroic Deva Artificer shielding elixir Class Damage Resistance Power Enhancement Racial Radiant Saving Throws When you use shielding elixir, the target gains radiant resistance in addition to the resistance the power normally grants. The radiant resistance is equal to the resistance normally granted and has the same duration. Also, when making a saving throw, the target can end the shielding elixir's effect as a free interrupt to add 1d6 to the saving throw result instead of gaining the normal benefit for ending the effect.
Astral Enmity Heroic Deva Avenger memory of a thousand lifetimes swear enmity Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial If you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to increase an attack roll against your oath target, you deal extra damage equal to the bonus gained from the racial power. This extra damage increases to twice the bonus to attack at 11th level, and to three times the bonus to attack at 21st level.
Astral Fire Heroic Dexterity13 Charisma13 Damage Bonus Fire Radiant You gain a +1 bonus to damage with powers that have the Fire or Radiant keyword. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.
Astral Heritage Heroic Bloodline Living humanoid Astral Heritage Defense Power Repertoire Skill Enhancement You gain the astral splendor utility power. Also, you gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks and Insight checks against angels, devas, devils, and rakshasas.
Astral Splendor Feat Utility You take on an imperious aspect, and silvery light -that of your astral soul- shines from your eyes, mouth, and heart Daily Divine, Stance Minor Action
Requirement: You must not be bloodied.
Effect: You enter the Astral Splendor stance.
While you remain in the stance, enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls made against you.
Also, you shed bright light within 6 squares, and dim light within a further 3 squares.
Special: This stance immediately ends if you become bloodied.
Astral Preservation Heroic Deva Invoker Covenant of Preservation Bloodied Enemy Channel Divinity Class Defense Power Enhancement Racial Support When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, each ally within 2 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to all defenses against attacks made by bloodied creatures. This bonus lasts until the end of the encounter.
Audacious Crow Heroic Team Skill Enhancement Teamwork You gain a +2 feat bonus to Thievery checks. This bonus increases by +1 for each member of your Team within 10 squares who is trained in Thievery or has this feat. The maximum total bonus from this feat is +5.
Auspicious Lineage Heroic Deva memory of a thousand lifetimes Power Enhancement Racial When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power, you add 1d8 to the triggering roll instead of 1d6.
Autohypnosis Heroic any psionic Arcana Class Healing Surge Skill Enhancement Your number of healing surges increases by 1. While you are not bloodied, when you would make an Endurance check, you can make an Arcana check instead.
Avandra's Boon Heroic any divine Avandra Class Miss Mitigation Saving Throws Worship When you roll a natural 1 on an attack roll or saving throw, you gain a +2 bonus to your next roll of the same type you make before the end of your next turn.
Avandra's Covenant Heroic Invoker Divine Covenant Avandra Class Saving Throws Support When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, you can allow an ally within 10 squares of you to make a saving throw instead of using your covenant manifestation.
Avenger's Fortunes Heroic Githzerai Avenger Class Healing Surge Mobility Racial Whenever you spend a healing surge, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. If you have an oath target, this shift must take you closer to or into a soace adjacent to that target.
Avenging Allure Heroic Avenger Censure of Unity Class Forced Movement Power Enhancement When you use your bond of censure power, add 2 to the number of squares you can pull the target.
Avenging Opportunist Heroic Human Avenger swear enmity Class Kill Effect Racial The first time in an encounter when you reduce your oath target to 0 hit points or less, you gain an extra move action that you must be used before the end of your next turn.
Avenging Resolution Heroic Avenger swear enmity Class Damage Bonus When you attack your oath target with a Weapon attack, treat all rolls of 1 or 2 on the damage dice as though the result were a 3 on the die. If your weapon's damage is 1d4 or 2d4, treat rolls of 1 as though the result were a 2 on the die instead.
Avernian Emissary Wrath Heroic Tiefling Assassin assassin's shroud infernal wrath Class Miss Mitigation Racial Once per encounter, when you miss a target that has your shrouds on it, you can use your infernal wrath racial power against it. This does not expend infernal wrath and can be done even if it is expended.
Avowed Dragonfoe Heroic Dragonborn Attack Bonus Bloodied Critical Dragon-hunting Racial Temporary Hit Points You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against dragons. This bonus increases to +2 when you are bloodied. In addition, when you score a critical hit against a dragon with a melee or close attack, you gain temporary hit points equal to the dragon's level.
Awakened Potential Heroic Multiclass Intelligence15 Arcana Multiclass Ardent Multiclass Battlemind Multiclass Psion Psionics You gain the Psionic Augmentation class feature and 1 power point. You can spend this power point to augment powers, feats, or magic items that are Augmentable. Once you spend this power point, you do not regain it until you take an extended rest. You also qualify for feats that require the Psionic Augmentation class feature. You gain an additional power point at 21st level. When you take this feat, choose Ardent, Battlemind, or Psion. This feat counts as a multiclass feat for that class.
Axe Expertise Heroic Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization When you make a Weapon attack with an axe, you can reroll one [W] of damage, or 2[W] for a daily attack. You must use the second result. The number of [W] you can reroll increases to 3[W] for a daily attack at 11th level, and to 2[W] for all attacks and 5[W] for a daily attacks at 21st level.
Axe Strike Heroic power strike Damage Bonus Miss Mitigation Power Enhancement When you miss a target with a Weapon attack using an Axe you have proficiency with and would deal no damage to it, you can expend your power strike class power. If you do, instead of the power's normal effects, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. For each +[W] past the first the power would normally deal, this damage increases by +2.
Backbreaking Staff Heroic backstab Class Power Enhancement When you use backstab on an attack using a staff, on a hit the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.
Backstabber Heroic Rogue Sneak Attack Class Damage Bonus The extra damage dice from your Sneak Attack class feature increase from d6 to d8.
Baleful Malediction Heroic Invoker Covenant of Malediction Attack Penalty Class Power Enhancement Whenever you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, each target hit by the power takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.
Balican High Praetor Heroic Pact Warlock Sorcerer-King Pact Warlock's Curse Balican Praetor Background Class Damage Bonus Defense Power Enhancement Triggered Support Whenever an enemy under your curse drops to 0 hit points, you gain the following benefit in addition to regaining your Fell Might: The first time an ally you can see hits an enemy with a damaging attack before the start of your next turn, you place your curse on that enemy without spending an action. If the target is already under your curse, the ally's attack instead deals extra damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier to that enemy. This extra damage increases to 5 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 7 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level. You can enhance powers associated with this feat with your Fell Might.
